item.title: Examples of How to Derive a Signing Key for Signature Version 4 (AWS) for Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists This is a sample script for “Examples of How to Derive a Signing Key for Signature Version 4” using Google Apps Script. In order to use AWS SDKs, there are the sample scripts for the languages of Java, .NET (C#), Python, Ruby, JavaScript (Node.js). But the sample script of Google Apps Script is not prepared. I saw the question related to this at Stackoverflow. So I would like to also introduce the sample script here.
